summary: Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son "born of the mask", he discovers just how looney child raising can be.
cast: Jamie Kennedy|Alan Cumming|Liam Falconer|Ryan Falconer|Traylor Howard|Steven Wright|Kal Penn|Ben Stein|Brett Pickup|Peter Callan|Ashley Lyons|Wayne McDaniel|Sandy Winton|Rebecca Massey|Issac Longmuir|Tayzin Fahey-Leigh|Skyla Laginha|Lochie Nazer Hennings|Andie Rogers|Alyssa McClelland|Trilby Glover|Josephine Chu|Solomon Freer|Ethan Coker|Ryan Johnson|Victoria Thaine|Bob Hoskins|Duncan Young|Michelle Hopper|Maya McClean|Ebony Conditsis|Ivah Seeto|Amber Todd|Damon Herriman|Raj Ryan|Emma Jackson|Jerry Minor|Holly Austin|Jeanette Cronin|Magda Szubanski|Peter Flett|Amanda Smyth|Matt Passmore|Tina Bursill|Anthony Kierann|Colin Borgonon|Ling Cooper Tang|Simon Maiden|Michael Denkha|Dorian Nkono|Adam Moulds|Wyvern 'Stevie' Wilkins|Hayes Loau|Chris Dair|Anthony Palmer|Ryan Sheppard|Harli Ames|Marney McQueen|Jaime Mears|Paul Pantano|Alberto Dominguez|Esosa Edmonds|Peter Plusch|Joyce Kurtz|Mona Marshall|Mary Mouser|Neil Ross|Richard Steven Horvitz|Bill Farmer|Bear|Igor Breakenback|Larry Cedar|Zoë Gameau|Michael Ienna|Otis|Craig Walker
title: La máscara 2
